updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train service on the North South Line has resumed. Free regular bus service has ceased.
NSL [Update]: Train services are progressively being restored. If your journey has been affected, you may download an e-Travel Chit as proof of your travel at https://t.co/dYFVNdxSLs.
[NSL] CLEARED: Train services on the North South Line are progressively resumed. Free regular bus service is still available btwn #AngMoKio and #Newton.
[NSL] UPDATE: Free regular bus svcs btwn #AngMoKio and #Newton. Our station staff will assist.
[NSL]: Due to a train fault, pls add 25mins train travel time from #AngMoKio to #Newton towards #MarinaSouthPier.
